Docs.summary: Extension methods for setting up Azure Monitor in an .

MemberSignature.Value: public static OpenTelemetry.IOpenTelemetryBuilder UseAzureMonitorExporter (this OpenTelemetry.IOpenTelemetryBuilder builder);
.method public static hidebysig class OpenTelemetry.IOpenTelemetryBuilder UseAzureMonitorExporter(class OpenTelemetry.IOpenTelemetryBuilder builder) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function UseAzureMonitorExporter (builder As IOpenTelemetryBuilder) As IOpenTelemetryBuilder

Docs.summary: Configures Azure Monitor Exporter for all signals.

remarks.para: This method configures Azure Monitor for use with OpenTelemetry by adding the Azure Monitor exporter for logging, distributed tracing, and metrics. It also configures the OpenTelemetry logger to include formatted messages and parsed state values.

<Extension()> Public Function UseAzureMonitorExporter (builder As IOpenTelemetryBuilder, configureAzureMonitor As Action(Of AzureMonitorExporterOptions)) As IOpenTelemetryBuilder

Docs.summary: Configures Azure Monitor Exporter for logging, distributed tracing, and metrics.

remarks.para: This method configures Azure Monitor for use with OpenTelemetry by adding the Azure Monitor exporter for logging, distributed tracing, and metrics. It also configures the OpenTelemetry logger to include formatted messages and parsed state values.
